subject: Your Chat Import is Complete! They're Ready in Xone
body:
{{header}}

Hi {{name}},

Your chat import has been completed successfully.

Here's what you can do with your imported chats in Xone:

  • Revisit important conversations: Easily find and review past discussions with AI, giving you valuable context for your current projects.
  • Collaborate more effectively: Share key insights from your chats with your team to make sure everyone has the information they need.
  • Boost productivity: Use your imported chats as a starting point for new prompts, custom bots, and streamlined workflows.

Access Your Imported Chats Now:

 
Your Chats

subject: You're Invited to Join Xone!
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

{{name}} has invited you to join your team on Xone, the ultimate AI-powered collaboration platform!

Xone makes it easy for teams to work together, create custom AI bots, share prompts, and streamline productivityâ€”all in one place.

To get started, just accept your invitation here:

Accept Invitation
 

Once you sign up, you'll get access to your team's Shared Brain where you can collaborate with the team, save prompts, and explore ready-to-use AI tools. You'll also have your own Private Brain for personal work.

{{footer}}

subject: Request for Additional Storage
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{company_admin_name}},

Heads up! {{username}} has run out of document storage on their Xone account and is requesting more space to upload additional documents.

To ensure they can continue collaborating smoothly with the team, you may want to review the storage allocation or upgrade your team's plan.

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Xone!
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Welcome to Xone! ðŸŽ‰ We're excited to have you on board as you begin your journey toward seamless AI collaboration for your team.

You're all set with a 30-day free trial to explore everything Xone has to offerâ€”no strings attached. Start leveraging powerful agents and curated prompts to boost your teamâ€™s productivity today.

Here's a quick guide to help you get started:

You can even import your existing chats from ChatGPT or Anthropicâ€”no need to worry about losing your past work.

1. Explore Your Shared Brain:
Each team has a Shared Brain where you can save prompts, create custom AI bots, and collaborate with your team in real-time. It's all organized in one place so everyone stays on the same page.

2. Connect with Agents & Prompts:
Build and use powerful AI agents tailored to your workflows, and tap into a growing library of curated prompts to save time and stay efficient.

3. Ready-to-Use Templates:
Get a head start! Check out our library of pre-built prompt and bot templates designed to help your team boost productivity instantly.

4. Private Brain (Just for You!):
You also have a Private Brainâ€”a space to store your personal prompts and bots, separate from the team's workspace.

To dive right in, log into your dashboard:

{{footer}}

subject: Requesting more users
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

We are so glad you want to share Xone with everyone on your team.

Our support team will reach out to you via email in the next 24 hours to understand your user requirements and process your request.

Xone is evolving as we speak. Soon this process will be so much simpler. We truly appreciate your patience.

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Xone! Verify Your Account
body:
{{header}}

Hi there!

Welcome to Xone, your all-in-one AI adaptation platform for teams! We're excited to have you on board.

With Xone, you can collaborate seamlessly with your team, chat with AI, save prompts, and create custom botsâ€”all within a shared or private space. Access multiple generative AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Llama without separate subscriptions, and track your team's AI adoption for smooth onboarding.

To get started, please verify your account by clicking the button below. This link will expire in 60 minutes.

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Xone Team

{{footer}}

We noticed that you requested to resend your email verification link. To complete the registration process and activate your account, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Xone Team

subject: Your Role Has Been Updated
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Your role on Xone has been updated by an administrator.

New Role: {{newRole}}

Previous Role: {{previousRole}}

Updated By: {{updatedBy}}

This change will take effect immediately. You may need to log out and log back in to see the new permissions associated with your updated role.

If you have any questions about this change, please contact your administrator or reach out to our support team.

 
Log In to Xone
 
{{footer}}
